# Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF)

> Documentation for Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF).

*Topics available: 2*

- [Attributed programming model overview (MEF)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/mef/attributed-programming-model-overview-mef.md): Get started with the attributed programming model, which is the default programming model for the Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF) in .NET.
- [Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/mef/index.md): Explore the Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF), which lets application developers discover and use extensions without configuration in .NET 4 or above.
